alert.note: Alert for Edmunds (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 10:10AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Edmunds and northeastern Faulk Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1109 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blumengard Colony, or 11 miles southwest of Ipswich, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pembrook Colony around 1120 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include North Scatterwood Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
